trans-unit.source: Provides a location into which statements can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 提供可將陳述式序列化至的位置。

trans-unit.source: Usually, statements are serialized into the statement collection that is on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: 通常，陳述式會序列化到內容堆疊上的陳述式集合。

trans-unit.source: You can modify this behavior by creating a statement context and calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection.Populate%2A> method with a collection of objects whose statements you want stored in the statement table.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改此行為所建立的陳述式的內容，然後呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection.Populate%2A>方法與您想要其陳述式中儲存的物件的陳述式資料表集合。

trans-unit.source: As each object is serialized in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A> method, it has its contents placed in the statement table and saved in the context.
trans-unit.target: 為每個物件會在序列化<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase.SerializeToExpression%2A>方法，它有它的內容放在陳述式資料表，並儲存在內容中。

trans-unit.source: If you push this object on the stack, it is your responsibility to integrate the statements added to it into your own collection of statements.
trans-unit.target: 如果您推送此物件在堆疊上時，您要負責整合到您自己的陳述式的集合加入的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.StatementContext" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of statements offered by the statement context.
trans-unit.target: 取得由陳述式內容所提供的陳述式集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection" /> containing statements offered by the statement context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ObjectStatementCollection" />，包含由陳述式內容提供的陳述式。
